mapper.insert: INSERT INTO businessUser (binID, binPW, binName, binCate, binCode, binEmail, binTell) VALUES (#{binID}, #{binPW}, #{binName}, #{binCate}, #{binCode}, #{binEmail}, #{binTell})

INSERT INTO Airline (binID, airTitle, departureAirport, arrivalAirport, airCompany, departureDateTime, arrivalDateTime, airPrice, cityNO) VALUES (#{binId}, #{airTitle}, #{departureAirport}, #{arrivalAirport}, #{airCompany}, #{departureDateTime}, #{arrivalDateTime}, #{airPrice}, #{cityNO})

INSERT INTO tick ( binID, tickImg, tickTitle, tickText, tickOp, tickPrice, tickDate, tickPlace, category) VALUES ( #{binID}, #{tickImg}, #{tickTitle}, #{tickText}, #{tickOp}, #{tickPrice}, #{tickDate}, #{tickPlace}, #{category})

INSERT INTO Package ( binId, packageTitle, packageText, packageMax, packagePrice, peopleCnt, startDateTime, endDateTime, imageUrl, packageCountry) VALUES ( #{binId}, #{packageTitle}, #{packageText}, #{packageMax}, #{packagePrice}, #{peopleCnt}, #{startDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{imageUrl}, #{packageCountry})
